title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-5.11 - Thermometers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-5.11 - Thermometers

State Regulations

Each hot water boiler shall have a thermometer so located
and connected that it shall be easily readable when observing the water
pressure or altitude. The thermometer shall be so located that it shall at all
times indicate the temperature in degrees Fahrenheit of the water in the boiler
at or near the outlet. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-5.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
